name: Awards Issued
description: Awards Issued data set returns all awards that have been issued and their details for all users over a date range. Required Permission Advanced Data Sets > Can execute Awards Issued (Organization level) Custom Reporting Framework > Can See DataHub (Organization level) Available Filters Returned Fields

columns.name: AwardId
columns.description: Identifier of the award

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Name of the award in Brightspace.

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Type of award: certificate or badge.

columns.name: Credits
columns.description: The number of credits associated with the award.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: The identifier of the of the award recipient.

columns.name: UserName
columns.description: The username of the of the award recipient.

columns.name: FirstName
columns.description: The first name of the award recipient.

columns.name: LastName
columns.description: The last name of the of the award recipient.

columns.name: OrgDefinedId
columns.description: The organization-defined identifier to which this award is associated for the award recipient.

columns.name: IssuedBy
columns.description: The identifier of the user who issued the award.

columns.name: IssuerUserName
columns.description: The user name of the user who issued the award.

columns.name: IssuerFirstName
columns.description: The first name of the user who issued the award.

columns.name: IssuerLastName
columns.description: The last name of the user who issued the award.

columns.name: IssueDate
columns.description: The date when the award was issued.

columns.name: RevokedId
columns.description: Indicates if the award has been revoked.

columns.name: Criteria
columns.description: Indicates the criteria that must be met to earn the award.

columns.name: Evidence
columns.description: Displays the evidence that the criteria for the award was met.

columns.name: ExpiryDate
columns.description: Indicates the date when the award expires

columns.name: OrgUnitId
columns.description: The organization unit identifier for the org in which the award was issued.

columns.name: OrgUnitName
columns.description: The organization unit name for the org in which the award was issued.

columns.name: OrgUnitCode
columns.description: The organization unit code for the org in which the award was issued.
